game.name: Before Exit: Supermarket
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Before Exit: Supermarket combines features from roguelike with walking simulator. As Supermarket employee you clean up damaged items, wipe up stains, and turn off the lights. Your task is close the store behind you, hoping that all tasks have been completed.
